properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 3:53PM PST until January 19 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt this
evening subsiding to 5 to 10 kt on Sunday. Steep mixed seas of
12 to 16 feet becoming westerly 10 to 12 feet by Sunday morning.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON
